channel.title: La Tinaja
channel.description: My name is Brian Jones. These are my notes on topics including books, publishing, tech, and history.

item.title: Weekly Reading: November 8, 2015
item.description: Things I read this week included video games and smartphones.

item.title: Fix Plex Stuttering on Amazon Fire TV Stick
item.description: These settings worked to get rid of annoying stuttering in Plex on Amazon Fire TV Stick.

item.title: Weekly Reading: August 30, 2015
item.description: Things I read this week included lone wolfs, inquisitors, and murders.

item.title: Weekly Reading: August 23, 2015
item.description: Things I read this week included honey badgers and drones.

item.title: Which Internet to Build For?
item.description: Do you build for the old internet of creating or the new one of sharing?

item.title: Weekly Reading: August 16, 2015
item.description: Things I read this week include a celebration of decoding ancient languages and personal data arbitrage.

item.title: Weekly Reading: August 9, 2015
item.description: Things I read this week include an overview of typography for the web, a lamentation for the old Internet, and celebrity empathy.

item.title: A Run in Berlin
item.description: Streets from a morning run in Berlin.

item.title: Weekly Reading: July 19, 2015
item.description: Things I read this week include a new Scandinavian detective series and profiles.
